name: lycan_kill_06
text: May your house long record your name.
text_simple: may your house long record your name

name: lycan_kill_07
text: Thrown to the wolves. He he he he heh.
text_simple: thrown to the wolves he he he he heh

name: lycan_kill_09
text: In my father's name I strike you down.
text_simple: in my fathers name i strike you down

name: lycan_kill_10
text: I shake your corpse in my jaws.
text_simple: i shake your corpse in my jaws

name: lycan_kill_11
text: My claws bathe in your blood.
text_simple: my claws bathe in your blood

name: lycan_kill_12
text: The alpha wolf is your omega.
text_simple: the alpha wolf is your omega

name: lycan_rival_01
text: Shapeshift your way out of that!
text_simple: shapeshift your way out of that

name: lycan_rival_03
text: Even shapeshifting can't help you now.
text_simple: even shapeshifting cant help you now

name: lycan_rival_04
text: Were you bear conjured into man, or man conjured into bear?
text_simple: were you bear conjured into man or man conjured into bear

name: lycan_rival_05
text: Ha, bears are no match for the cunning of wolves.
text_simple: ha bears are no match for the cunning of wolves

name: lycan_rival_06
text: What bears do with strength, a wolf does with cunning.
text_simple: what bears do with strength a wolf does with cunning

name: lycan_rival_07
text: I'm glad it was you, Lone Druid.
text_simple: im glad it was you lone druid

name: lycan_rival_08
text: You always were a shifty bastard.
text_simple: you always were a shifty bastard

name: lycan_rival_10
text: You were no master of me.
text_simple: you were no master of me

name: lycan_rival_11
text: You crumble like the kingdom of Slom.
text_simple: you crumble like the kingdom of slom

name: lycan_rival_12
text: Your pelt shall make a fine rug.
text_simple: your pelt shall make a fine rug

name: lycan_rival_13
text: One eye is better than none.
text_simple: one eye is better than none

name: lycan_rival_14
text: All those eyes and you didn't see me coming.
text_simple: all those eyes and you didnt see me coming

name: lycan_rival_15
text: Tis no treason to kill a tyrant king.
text_simple: tis no treason to kill a tyrant king

name: lycan_rival_16
text: When you strike a king's neck, you better take his head.
text_simple: when you strike a kings neck you better take his head

name: lycan_rival_17
text: The day has eyes. Night, ears. The wolf, teeth.
text_simple: the day has eyes night ears the wolf teeth

name: lycan_rival_19
text: Stop complaining. You're already a skeleton for God's sake.
text_simple: stop complaining youre already a skeleton for gods sake

name: lycan_rival_20
text: A boar is a wolf's natural prey.
text_simple: a boar is a wolfs natural prey

name: lycan_rival_21
text: Your sacrifice shall not be forgotten.
text_simple: your sacrifice shall not be forgotten

name: lycan_rival_22
text: It pains me to kill you, brother, but it had to be done.
text_simple: it pains me to kill you brother but it had to be done

name: lycan_rival_23
text: You'll collect no bounty for my pelt.
text_simple: youll collect no bounty for my pelt

name: lycan_rival_24
text: I send you back to Seventh Hell!
text_simple: i send you back to seventh hell

name: lycan_rival_25
text: You were a disgrace to the Pyrexae!
text_simple: you were a disgrace to the pyrexae

name: lycan_rival_28
text: Even you should fear the full moon.
text_simple: even you should fear the full moon

name: lycan_rival_29
text: The night needs nobility, not a beastly fairy tale.
text_simple: the night needs nobility not a beastly fairy tale
